title: 2017 Brit Awards: The most outrageous outfits
text: 2017 Brit Awards: The most outrageous outfits The Brit Awards, which commenced Feb. 22 at the O2 Arena in London, featured plenty of eye-catching looks. Fashion do or fashion don't? We'll let you be the judge, starting with the leg-baring ensembles (and mixed denim masterpiece) worn by the members of Little Mix. Post to Facebook 2017 Brit Awards: The most outrageous outfits The Brit Awards, which commenced Feb. 22 at the O2 Arena in London, featured plenty of eye-catching looks. Fashion do or fashion don't? We'll let you be the judge, starting with the leg-baring ensembles (and mixed denim masterpiece) worn by the members of Little Mix.  //usat.ly/2lxka4F     2017 Brit Awards: The most outrageous outfits None The Brit Awards, which commenced Feb. 22 at the O2 Arena in London, featured plenty of eye-catching looks. Fashion do or fashion don't? We'll let you be the judge, starting with the leg-baring ensembles (and mixed denim masterpiece) worn by the members of Little Mix. Samir Hussein, WireImage Ellie Goulding showed plenty of skin at the awards show in this black, slinky number. John Phillips, Getty Images Pixie Lott followed suit, also showing some midriff. John Phillips, Getty Images Robbie Williams' dancers got the same memo. Gareth Cattermole, Getty Images Katy Perry's Versace number was sparkly and very clearly a set. Fred Duval, FilmMagic The same thing could be said about Nicole Scherzinger's boots-and-jacket combo. HANNAH MCKAY, EPA Another Brit Awards trend: voluminous sleeves. Tallia Storm had them. Mike Marsland, Mike Marsland/WireImage
